1.0.1.en: Changed language to TypeScript and added more Swedish translations.

1.0.3.en: Removed lib and minor update to the Typescript conversion

2.0.0.en: New version released! We've introduced Dutch as a new language option and have also incorporated additional drivers. Due to the substantial overhaul that these changes entailed, it's necessary for you to delete your existing devices.

2.0.2.en: Corrected date format for diffrent languages

2.1.0.en: Had a fault in BlueAirClient using the wrong lib. now fixed

2.1.2.en: Prepering for new AWS support made some smaller changes

3.0.0.en: Added support for HelthProtect and DustMagnet devices.

3.1.3.en: Added action cards to HealthProtect and DustMagnet

3.1.4.en: Added new action cards for all models.

3.1.5.en: Now supporting version 12 and above. added new airpurifier driver class

3.1.6.en: Added tVOC support for HealtProtect and DustMagnet

3.1.7.en: Fallback code to region to support more regions from AWS

3.1.8.en: Fixed correct region maping from the API in the supporting client

3.1.9.en: Updated to Homey 3.6.2 and removed some pesky bugs.

3.1.11.en: Removed faulty code in the classic driver

3.1.12.en: Filter has changed was not taking care of properly

3.1.13.en: Got some bad values triggering some of the flow cards sometimes. and added decimals to some values

3.1.14.en: Split of fuctions to other fils that are common to HealthProtect and DustMagnet

3.1.17.en: Corrected some error logging and compiling error

3.1.19.en: Corrected spelling and texts based from Homey App review from las publish.

3.1.20.en: Updated undelying modules for suecurity fixes

3.1.21.en: Improved AWS Client and updated other node packages

3.1.22.en: Updated backgroup packages to fix login failure

3.1.23.en: Fixes app crach because of to many request http error 429.
